Examples.instruction: Click the image to access the link!

Examples.guide: Use this template when no other announcments exist, remove once others are added. This will be automatic later.

Announcements.name: USACE EGIS Strategy 2024
Announcements.instruction: The EGI&S Strategy and associated Distribution Memo are available at the following KMP SharePoint location by clicking the image

Announcements.name: One Drive Virtual Training
Announcements.details: CIO/G-6 has deployed One Drive to all SAD end user systems. In order to assist USACE employees to better understand this capability, OneDrive training sessions have been scheduled - dates, times and Teams meeting login information for the sessions are below.  All sessions will cover the same content, so you will only need to attend one session.
